name: Odds & Ends
description:
This version is an early demo of a longer game that's in development. 

Odds & Ends is the bastard offspring of a point-and-click game and a Twine game. Sometimes objects on the desk change, sometimes the associated memory changes. Players are unlikely to find everything. It'll be a long play when it's done.

One of the core themes of the game is honesty—everything I've put into it is completely true. It's been difficult to write at times.

Some of the memories included: the first family holiday after my mum died, inheriting a box of fingernails, eating fresh fish in Mongolia.

Artwork by Kate Holden.
